intro: Rhizemys, commonly known as the rhizemys plant, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Araceae. It is characterized by its rhizomatous growth habit, which allows it to spread vegetatively through underground stems. The plant typically features heart-shaped leaves and produces small, spadix-like inflorescences. Rhizemys species are often found in moist, tropical environments, thriving in shaded or semi-shaded areas. Due to their ornamental value, some species are cultivated as houseplants or in water gardens.
